video.title: Rita
video.synopsis: Independent, outspoken and adored by her students, private school teacher Rita fares less well with adults in this comedy-drama from Denmark.

episodes.synopsis: Ricco's father-in-law turns out to be Rita's high school sweetheart. Meanwhile, Rita's battle at school with a 14-year-old know-it-all goes wrong.
episodes.title: The Idealist

episodes.synopsis: A new student suffers socially when his parents demand a schoolwide ban on sugar. Meanwhile, Rita's estranged mother wants to get back in touch.
episodes.title: The Teacher

episodes.synopsis: When a school talent show forces Rita to re-evaluate her uncompromising relationship to truth, she realizes she's been doing some lying of her own.
episodes.title: The Anarchist

episodes.synopsis: Rita finds porn on Jeppe's computer and fears he'll share what she knows firsthand is a destructive relationship to sex.
episodes.title: The Whore

episodes.synopsis: Rita protects a troubled kid with ADHD from vandalism charges but forgets to fight for her own son when he's the victim of hate crime bullying.
episodes.title: The Protector

episodes.synopsis: Rita finds drugs at school, but the accused student points Rita in the direction of her own son, Jeppe. Molly gets a job at a hospice.
episodes.title: The Hypocrite

episodes.synopsis: When Rita takes over a second-grade theater production, her own life story begins to blend with the fairy tale the kids are playing out.
episodes.title: The Princess

episodes.synopsis: A lonely Rita starts hanging out with Rosa. But all hell breaks loose when Rosa realizes that Rita was the one her dad was having an affair with.
episodes.title: The Mother

episodes.synopsis: A pregnant Rita faces a difficult decision: She can keep the baby but never reveal who the father is, or she can get an abortion.
episodes.title: The Grown Up

episodes.synopsis: Rita and Rasmus move in together, and Rita tries her best to act like an adult -- until Rasmus puts a rose bed in her beloved wilderness of a garden.
episodes.title: The Garden

episodes.synopsis: Rita "lends" her own grandchild to a pregnant girl in her class in an attempt to convince her to get an abortion, but the plan backfires.
episodes.title: And Baby Makes Three

episodes.synopsis: It's sports day, and Helle wants to protect the losers from having an upsetting experience -- but Rita takes up the struggle for the right to win.
episodes.title: Team Player

episodes.synopsis: Another teacher is terrorizing Rita's student, and Rita has to take up the cause -- but it's not easy when the teacher uses bureaucracy as a weapon.
episodes.title: I Love You

episodes.synopsis: A student in Rita's class falls hopelessly in love with her at the same time that her own first love, Tom, reappears in her life at a family baptism.
episodes.title: First Love

episodes.synopsis: Rita and Rasmus struggle to save their relationship, but an innocent meeting with a colleague has unexpected consequences.
episodes.title: The Role Model

episodes.synopsis: For the first time in her life, Rita has gone down for the count, but she has to rediscover her fighting spirit when Erik strikes a student.
episodes.title: Weeds

episodes.synopsis: Inspired by local politics, Rita holds an election in her class. Uffe gets a job at the school, but it sparks conflict with Hjørdis.
episodes.title: The Candidate

episodes.synopsis: Helle hires a motivational coach for the students. Meanwhile, Jeppe moves in with his boyfriend, and Rita struggles with living on her own.
episodes.title: The Basement

episodes.synopsis: A problem student goes on a destructive rampage, Hjørdis makes progress with her second graders, and a man from Rita's past shows up.
episodes.title: The sponsor Kid

episodes.synopsis: To combat loneliness, Rita invites some students to her house. Meanwhile, Hjørdis tries to spice up her sex life with Uffe.
episodes.title: Evening Classes

episodes.synopsis: Rita's fourth graders come down with head lice, and she decides to delouse them herself. Meanwhile, Helle faces evaluation by her peers.
episodes.title: Lice

episodes.synopsis: Rita tries to keep the police in the dark when Hjørdis decides on the perfect item to bury in a time capsule: marijuana.
episodes.title: Free Fall

episodes.synopsis: Overcome by stress, Helle asks Rita to become the school's temporary headmaster, and Hjørdis's class celebrates Saint Lucy's day with style.
episodes.title: The Leader

episodes.synopsis: Rita agrees to act as temporary headmaster in Helle's absence, and Hjørdis and Uffe face an important decision regarding their relationship.
episodes.title: The Test
